sense.gloss: to apply pressure from above, to press down
to stamp (i.e. a passport), to apply a seal
to press (someone for something), to urge, to compel, to influence
to overwhelm, to overpower, to repress
to push (events along), to advance (a plan)
to do in spite of ..., to do even though ..., to force

x: 念を押す・ねんをおす
駄目を押す・だめをおす

sense.gloss: (of light) to be diffused across an entire surface
imposition (i.e. of rules, of a decision), compulsion
pushing from behind (a cart, etc.), pusher
to pin down, to hold down, to press down, to hold in place, to hold steady
to cover (esp. a part of one's body with one's hand), to clutch (a body part in pain), to press (a body part)
to get a hold of, to obtain, to seize, to catch, to arrest
to quell, to subdue, to suppress, to repress, to hold back, to check, to curb, to contain
to press against, to push against, to force against
to foist on (task, responsibility), to impose (one's will)

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑押↑↓お↓しが↑足↑↓た↓りない。
↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑意見↑↓いけん↓を↑押↑↓お↓しつけないでくれ。
sdata.e: Don't press your opinions on me.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓にそれをやる↑気↑↓き↓があるならあと↑押↑↓お↓ししよう。
sdata.e: I'll stand behind you if you are going to do it.

sdata.j: ↑緊急↑↓きんきゅう↓の↑場合↑↓ばあい↓は、このボタンを↑押↑↓お↓しなさい。
sdata.e: In case of an emergency, push this button.

sdata.j: その↑橋↑↓はし↓は↑洪水↑↓こうずい↓で↑押↑↓お↓し↑流↑↓なが↓されてしまった。
sdata.e: The bridge was carried away by the flood.

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓はその↑子供↑↓こども↓を↑押↑↓お↓し↑入↑↓い↓れに↑閉↑↓と↓じ↑込↑↓こ↓めた。
sdata.e: The burglar shut the child in the closet.

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓が↑夜↑↓よる↓↑銀行↑↓ぎんこう↓に↑押↑↓お↓し↑入↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: The burglars broke into the bank at night.

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓が↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑押↑↓お↓し↑入↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: A burglar broke into his house.

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓が↑金↑↓きん↓を↑盗↑↓ぬす↓みにその↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑押↑↓お↓し↑入↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: A thief broke into the house to steal the money.

sdata.j: ↑強盗↑↓ごうとう↓が↑近所↑↓きんじょ↓の↑家↑↓いえ↓に↑押↑↓お↓し↑入↑↓い↓ったことを↑聞↑↓き↓いていますか。
sdata.e: Have you heard that a burglar broke into my neighbor's house?
